ygData.subject: Re: human wizard spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Eheheh in actual situation you realy must be a strange person to be wizard much work, much much risk ( even a green monsters kill you easy if they came
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

>I don't understand why any race would want to become a wizard. That's for us.

Eheheh in actual situation you realy must be a strange person to be wizard
much work, much much risk ( even a green monsters kill you easy if they
came near you) if 2 monsters go on you you cant cast any spell and they eat
you so fast... Spells at first fail after that they start to get some punch
but monsters also get much more punch. and when you think you finaly can
have some realible spells all a new with new ciklus of spells. mana
meditating and running to recover corpse as your warrior friends thinked
that you will resist this little 2 orcs a bit longer, is a life of a
wizard. I hope that at last in later lv somone will call i need a wizard in
group now ( less then 16 lv ) i never seen anyone searching for a wizard
clerics, paladins, druids are all time requested so calling healing classes
we nukers are out of game for now sight sight (strange bards are more
requestesd in group and they have better solo play then wizards)




Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)




http://www.tip.it/wizard


mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com
